ncrsDetermination.abcd:FullScientificNameString: Apis mellifera L. var. fasciata Latr.

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: GREECE Attiki DAFNI, 10 km W. Athens

ncrsDetermination.abcd:InformalNameString: Blue black, mica poor, serpentinised abundant Ilmenite. Chrome-diopside and Garnet common. Inclusions common.
